scripts.build-front-prod: cd ../konsti-client && npm run build && cd ../konsti-server && npm run copy-front
scripts.build-front-staging: cd ../konsti-client && npm run build-staging && cd ../konsti-server && npm run copy-front
scripts.build-front-dev: cd ../konsti-client && npm run build-dev && cd ../konsti-server && npm run copy-front
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run prepare-deploy-prod && eb deploy Konsti-env
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run prepare-deploy-staging && eb deploy konsti-staging-env
scripts.flow-typed-install: rimraf flow-typed && flow-typed install --skip --ignoreDeps peer bundle
scripts.generate-data: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r esm lib/test/data-generation/runGenerators.js
scripts.generate-serials: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r esm lib/utils/generateSerials.js
scripts.prepare-deploy-prod: npm run build-front-prod && npm run build
scripts.prepare-deploy-staging: npm run build-front-staging && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run build && node -r esm lib/server.js
scripts.start-dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r esm lib/server.js
scripts.start-prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node -r esm lib/server.js
scripts.test-assign: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node -r esm lib/test/testAssignPlayers.js
